settings.title: Paradise
settings.caption: Welcome to
settings.subtitle: Paradise Garden Club is an urban nursery and public home to all types of growers. We sell plants, share knowledge, and most of all we support our community, where veteran green-thumbs and newbie naturalists grow alongside one another.

settings.title: Now shipping!*
settings.caption: Shop Paradise, anywhere.
settings.subtitle: Packed in 100% recycled materials (so go ahead, grab another one). *Select items only.
settings.label: Shop now

settings.title: Letters from paradise
settings.caption: Sign up for newsletters from Paradise as we get our store up and running!

settings.title: Follow us
settings.caption: Feel fresh — follow us on Instagram and other social media :)

settings.title: CALL (816) 890-9121
settings.caption: Visit us in Paradise for indoor house plants, succulents, growing supplies and more!

settings.title: ..Or want to join our paradise family with your own store?
settings.content:
Whether you're just looking for some Paradise in your own life, or wanting to spread the joy of gardening with your community... we'd love to chat with you.

Contact Us Today!

settings.title: Craving A Paradise Garden Club Near You?
Newsletter
settings.content:
Stay up to date on the latest product releases, special offers & news by signing up for our newsletter.

Read our privacy policy.

settings.title: Get plants, planters and more delivered straight to your door.
Let us get to know you!
settings.content: Send us a message with a bit of information about your workshop, brand, business or products and one of our team members will get back to you ASAP. We love to work with high-quality, earth-friendly and consumer-conscious brands — if that sounds like you, please don't hesitate to reach out!
